data.actual_result: You see "Edit Message" but the option doesn't do anything
data.short_description: You can select "Edit Message" in a channel you can't send messages in, if it's your message, but the option doesn't do anything
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message in a channel - Have a friend deny you perms to send messages in that channel - Hold down on your message - Observe the option menu
